name: Bone Collector (Drusyc123)
description:
Bevy Jam #2 : https://itch.io/jam/bevy-jam-2

Source code : https://github.com/thmsgntz/bone-collector

Help Skelly to collect bones, combine them and build his body!

Move : W / S / D / A
Run: Left Shift

This is my first game ever. I started learning Rust+Bevy 2 months ago. 

Had a really fun time learning and working on this project! :)
